languages.text: Род Версериан возвысился над конкурентами и более никогда не становился целью преследования — даже после того, как спустя многие десятилетия почитаемый патриарх скончался в своей постели в окружении скорбящих близких.
House Werserian rose above its rivals and was never again the target of persecution — even after their esteemed patriarch died decades later in his bed surrounded by his grieving loved ones.
languages.original_text: Род Версериан возвысился над конкурентами и более никогда не становился целью преследования — даже после того, как спустя многие десятилетия почитаемый патриарх скончался в своей постели в окружении скорбящих близких.

traits.locale_text: After completing his last journey alongside the Lord Captain, Abelard Werserian with the highest approval of the Rogue Trader, resigned from the position of a Seneschal, and assumed the role of the head of his sizeable family. The Werserian house rose above its rivals and was never a target of persecution again — even after their treasured patriarch died decades later in his bed among the grieving loved ones.

After completing his last journey alongside the Lord Captain, Abelard Werserian with the highest approval of the Rogue Trader, resigned from the position of a Seneschal, and assumed the role of the head of his sizeable family. The Werserian house rose above its rivals and was never a target of persecution again — even after their treasured patriarch died decades later in his bed among the grieving loved ones.
House Werserian rose above its rivals and was never the target of persecution again — even after their honoured patriarch died decades later in his bed surrounded by grieving loved ones.
House Werserian rose above its rivals and was never the target of persecution again — even after their honoured patriarch died decades later in his bed surrounded by grieving loved ones.
House Werserian rose above its rivals and was never again the target of persecution — even after their esteemed patriarch died decades later in his bed surrounded by his grieving loved ones.
House Werserian rose above its rivals and was never again the target of persecution — even after their esteemed patriarch died decades later in his bed surrounded by his grieving loved ones.

languages.text: 韦尔森家族超越了它的竞争对手，再也没有沦为遭到迫害的目标。几十年后，家族尊敬的族长于卧榻上离世，簇拥在他身边的亲人们悲痛不已。
languages.original_text: House Werserian rose above its rivals and was never again the target of persecution — even after their esteemed patriarch died decades later in his bed surrounded by his grieving loved ones.

traits.locale_text: 韦尔森家族超越了它的竞争对手，再也没有沦为遭到迫害的目标。几十年后，家族尊敬的族长于卧榻上离世，簇拥在他身边的亲人们悲痛不已。

languages.text: Das Haus Werserian erhob sich über seine Rivalen und wurde nie wieder zum Opfer einer Verfolgung — selbst, nachdem der verehrte Patriarch Jahrzehnte später friedlich in seinem Bett gestorben war, umgeben von trauernden Verwandten.
languages.original_text: House Werserian rose above its rivals and was never again the target of persecution — even after their esteemed patriarch died decades later in his bed surrounded by his grieving loved ones.

traits.locale_text: Das Haus Werserian erhob sich über seine Rivalen und wurde nie wieder zum Opfer einer Verfolgung — selbst, nachdem der verehrte Patriarch Jahrzehnte später friedlich in seinem Bett gestorben war, umgeben von trauernden Verwandten.

languages.text: La maison Werserian s'imposa face aux familles rivales et ne fut plus jamais la cible de nouvelles persécutions, même après que son bien-aimé patriarche eut rendu son dernier souffle dans son lit, entouré des siens, des décennies plus tard.
languages.original_text: House Werserian rose above its rivals and was never again the target of persecution — even after their esteemed patriarch died decades later in his bed surrounded by his grieving loved ones.

traits.locale_text: La maison Werserian s'imposa face aux familles rivales et ne fut plus jamais la cible de persécutions, même après que son bien-aimé patriarche eut rendu son dernier souffle dans son lit, entouré des siens, des décennies plus tard.

languages.text: La casa Werserian se impuso a sus rivales y nunca volvió a ser objetivo de persecuciones, ni tan siquiera después del fallecimiento de su estimado patriarca décadas más tarde, en su cama y rodeado de sus seres queridos.
languages.original_text: House Werserian rose above its rivals and was never again the target of persecution — even after their esteemed patriarch died decades later in his bed surrounded by his grieving loved ones.

traits.locale_text: La casa Werserian se impuso a sus rivales y nunca volvió a ser objetivo de persecuciones, ni tan siquiera después del fallecimiento de su venerable patriarca décadas más tarde, en su cama y rodeado de sus seres queridos.

languages.text: ウェルザリアン家は対抗勢力を蹴散らし、その後は二度と迫害の対象にならなかった。それは数十年後、死の床についた誉れ高き教父が、悲嘆にくれる肉親たちに囲まれながらこの世を去った後も、変わることはなかった。
languages.original_text: House Werserian rose above its rivals and was never again the target of persecution — even after their esteemed patriarch died decades later in his bed surrounded by his grieving loved ones.

traits.locale_text: ウェルザリアン家は対抗勢力を蹴散らし、その後は二度と迫害の対象にならなかった。それは数十年後、死の床についた誉れ高き教父が、悲嘆にくれる肉親たちに囲まれながらこの世を去った後も、変わることはなかった。

languages.text: Werserian Hanesi, rakiplerinden daha yüksek bir mertebeye çıktı ve bir daha eziyete maruz kalmadı. Saygıdeğer aile reisinin on yıllar sonra, yas içindeki sevdiklerinin refakatinde vefatından sonra da bu durum değişmedi.
languages.original_text: House Werserian rose above its rivals and was never again the target of persecution — even after their esteemed patriarch died decades later in his bed surrounded by his grieving loved ones.

traits.locale_text: Werserian Hanesi rakiplerinden daha yüksek bir mertebeye çıktı ve bir daha eziyete maruz kalmadı. Saygıdeğer aile reisinin on yıllar sonra, yas içindeki sevdiklerinin refakatinde vefat etmesinin ardından bile.
